text: Nyuma mwe ubwanyu (mubirengaho) muricana, munamenesha bamwe muri mwe mu ngo zabo, munashyigikirana mu kubakorera ubuhemu n’ubugome. N’iyo babagannye barafatiwe ku rugamba mubatangira ingurane zo kubabohora kandi ari ikizira kuri mwe kubamenesha. Ese mwemera bimwe mu gitabo (Tawurati) mugahakana ibindi? Nta kindi gihembo cy’ukora ibyo muri mwe uretse igisebo mu buzima bwo ku isi, ndetse no ku munsi w’imperuka bazashyirwa mu bihano bikomeye cyane. Kandi Allah ntabwo ayobewe ibyo mukora
